name: Crashy Racing
description:
Crashy racing is an indie racing game with a theme and a very simple gameplay.
Playing is very easy, you have to drive the car through a highway full of vehicles, all you have to do is make your way through the highway, and get as far as possible.
The only thing that will stop you from moving forward and losing the current game is crashing into other vehicles.

With this background the game may seem very simple to play, but there are certain inducements that make it more difficult:

-The controls of this game are perfectly balanced to allow playing with tranquility and total control, but also to make the game challenging and make playing and breaking records difficult.

-The speed of the vehicle will become increasingly larger, making it increasingly difficult to dodge and not collide with other vehicles.

How to play:

-Use the mouse to move through the menus.

-To change the lane of the car, you must keep the left click on the screen, drag slightly to the right / left and release the button.
